interest_explanation: Intel introduced a new method for AI acceleration using speculative decoding, achieving up to 2.8 times faster LLM inference. Additionally, the company highlighted its progress in exascale computing with the Aurora Supercomputer and released an AI PC Global Report, emphasizing the importance of Intel-powered AI PCs in unlocking business potential.
interest_drivers: Speculative Decoding Advance for AI acceleration

June 30, 2025

# Intel Xeon 6 Slashes Power Consumption for Nokia Core Network Customers

Latest Xeon 6 CPUs with E-cores boost efficiency by 60% and performance by 150% over the previous generation.
